name: Crosps
description:
Crosps stemmed from the idea of "What is the least effective way of defending your farm from wasps?" after my friend slapped a wasp out of mid air. After a solid hour of laughing too hard at a farmer running into a field with 2 hand guns blindly shooting, I wanted to make a game. Change "Dual Wielding Hand Guns" to "Stupidly Old Sniper" and this game was born.

Crosps is Duck Hunt meets pain.

With stupidly small wasps, and a cross hair filling the screen, precision and patience are a must have. And by God, you must have a lot of time to spare - although a simple concept, shooting the stupid wasps out of the air is bloody well impossible.

"If you aren't already suicidal, DON'T play this game - 6/5"

- Cameron Showell, Professional Robloxer

Featuring a (soon to be) Story Mode, a Challenge Mode to snap your brain in half, and a stupidly infinite Endless Mode that if you play long enough you will fill your screen with wasps.

"5 Stars, Very addicting, but Impossibly difficult"

-Thomas McNulty, Car Boi

So GO! Play now! Shoot those wasps! Loose your life to me! It's all worth it in the end....

"I rate it 10/10 for fun and 1000000/10 for me wanting to die"

-Joe Earp
